weekly picks (Dec 3 week 2023)

Posted on December 18, 2023 in 2023dec,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 Dec 3rd week collection

  1. PhysRevX.13.041052 A Race-Track Trapped-Ion Quantum Processor (PRX)

  2. 209 Scaling Up a Trapped-Ion Quantum Computer (Physics)

  3. PhysRevLett.131.256501 Controlled Frustration Release on the Kagome Lattice by Uniaxial-Strain Tuning (PRL)

  4. PhysRevLett.131.256201 Giant Correlated Gap and Possible Room-Temperature Correlated States in Twisted Bilayer ${\mathrm{MoS}}_{2}$ (PRL)

  5. PhysRevLett.131.256601 Edge-Selective Extremal Damping from Topological Heritage of Dissipative Chern Insulators (TMeng, PRL)

  6. PhysRevLett.131.256701 Spinon Heat Transport in the Three-Dimensional Quantum Magnet PbCuTe2O6 (PbCuTe2O6, PRL)

  7. 2312.11464 Symmetry Enforced Fermi Surface Degeneracies Observed in Time-Reversal Symmetry-Breaking Superconductor LaNiGa$_2$ (arXiv)

  8. 2312.11155 Possible manifestation of topological superconductivity and Majorana bound states in the microwave response of thin FeSe1-xTex film (arXiv)

  9. 2312.11002 Suppression of superconductivity by Sb-substitution into CeOBiS2 single crystals (arXiv)

  10. 2312.10805 Nernst Sign-Reversal in the Hexatic Vortex Phase of Weakly Disordered a-MoGe Thin Films (arXiv)

  11. 2312.10723 Atomic-site dependent pairing gap in monolayer FeSe/SrTiO$_3$(001)- ($\sqrt{13} \times \sqrt{13}$) (arXiv)

  12. 2312.10391 Strange memory effect of low-field microwave absorption in copper-substituted lead apatite (arXiv)

  13. 2312.10354 Superconductivity in a ferroelectric-like topological semimetal SrAuBi (arXiv)

  14. 2312.11162 Unconventional superconductivity in the Kondo-lattice system CeCu$_2$Si$_2$ – a personal perspective (Hassinger, arXiv)

  15. 2312.11457 Low-energy perspective on two-orbital Hund metals and the case of LaNiO2 (arXiv)

  16. 2312.10839 Spontaneous Formation of Altermagnetism from Orbital Ordering (arXiv)

  17. 2312.10838 Interaction and coherence in 2D bilayers (arXiv)

  18. 2312.10659 Flat bands, strange metals, and the Kondo effect (flatband, arXiv)

  19. 2312.10473 Topological phase transitions and thermal Hall effect in a noncollinear spin texture (arXiv)

  20. 2312.10192 Fragile magnetic order in metallic quasicrystals (arXiv)

  21. 2312.11435 Fractional Topological Charges in 2D Magnets (ARoach, arXiv)

  22. 2312.10151 Realizing Altermagnetism in Fermi-Hubbard Models with Ultracold Atoms (arXiv)

  23. 2312.11259 Weak localization as a probe of intervalley coherence in graphene multilayers (arXiv)

  24. 2312.11216 The effect of vacancy induced localized states on thermoelectric properties of armchair bilayer phosphorene nanoribbons (arXiv)

  25. 2312.11100 Analytical and numerical calculation of the effect of edge states of the Kane-Mele model on the RKKY interaction (edge states, arXiv)

  26. 2312.10954 Opto-twistronic Hall effect in a three-dimensional spiral lattice (EMele, arXiv)

  27. 2312.10832 Theory of zero-bias photocurrent in topological insulators (arXiv)

  28. 2312.10791 Symmetry breaking in zero field 2D electron bilayers (bilayer, arXiv)

  29. 2312.10782 Continuum of Metastable Helical States in Monoaxial Chiral Magnets: Effect of the Boundary Conditions (arXiv)

  30. 2312.10621 Identifying Klein tunneling signatures in bearded SSH lattices from bent flat bands (flatband, arXiv)

  31. 2312.10337 Predicted Multiple Walker Breakdowns for Current-Driven Domain-Wall Motion in Antiferromagnets (Mochizuki, arXiv)

  32. 2312.10227 Twist-angle tunable spin texture in WSe$_2$/graphene van der Waals heterostructures (spin texture bilayer, arXiv)

  33. 2312.10790 Surface quantum critical phenomena in disordered Dirac semimetals (arXiv)

  34. s41467-023-43853-4 Tetrahedral triple-Q magnetic ordering and large spontaneous Hall conductivity in the metallic triangular antiferromagnet Co1/3TaS2 (JGPark, Nature Communications)

  35. PhysRevB.108.235145 Electronic structure of the surface states of the ${\mathrm{Zr}}{3}{\mathrm{SnC}}{2}$ MAX phase (PRB)

  36. ad1252 Existence of complex magnetic ground state and topological Hall effect in centrosymmetric silicide DyScSi (New Journal of Physics)

  37. 2312.09729 Exposing the odd-parity superconductivity in CeRh$_2$As$_2$ with hydrostatic pressure (Ce, arXiv)

  38. 2312.09637 Topological Band Inversion and Chiral Majorana Mode in Hcp Thallium (arXiv)

  39. 2312.09728 Pressure-tuned quantum criticality in the locally non-centrosymmetric superconductor CeRh$_2$As$_2$ (arXiv)

  40. 2312.09421 Competition of disorder and electron-phonon coupling in 2H-TaSe$_{2-x}$S$_x$ ($0\le x\le 2$) as evidenced by Raman spectroscopy (arXiv)

  41. 2312.09668 Two-particle correlation effects on nonlinear optical responses in the 1d interacting Rice-Mele model (arXiv)

  42. 2312.09484 A coherent phonon-induced hidden quadrupolar ordered state in Ca$_2$RuO$_4$ (Ruthenate, arXiv)

  43. 2312.09286 Vacancy-induced tunable Kondo effect in twisted bilayer graphene (arXiv)

  44. 2312.09258 Comparative study of Kondo effect in Vanadium dichalcogenides VX$_2$ (X=Se & Te) (arXiv)

  45. 2312.09856 Nonlinear enhancement of coherent magnetization dynamics (arXiv)

  46. 2312.09694 Spin Injection into and Spin Pumping by Non-Collinear Antiferromagnets (arXiv)

  47. 2312.09487 Transport response of topological hinge modes in $\alpha$-Bi$_4$Br$_4$ (arXiv)

  48. 2312.09476 Emergence of 6-particle hexciton states in WS$_2$ and MoSe$_2$ monolayers (hexciton, arXiv)

  49. 2312.09349 Position operators and interband matrix elements of scalar and vector potentials in the 8-band Kane model (arXiv)
